title: The Stylist
creator_credit: MPO Productions, Joseph March and Lewis Jacobs
brief_description: Reveals the automobile designer, working behind guarded doors to style the “dream cars” for the following year, and the more distant future. Endeavours to explain pictorially the process by which the stylist finds inspiration for new body designs to charm the customer. Prologue spoken by William Clay Ford, vice president of Ford Motor Co. Music by Sol Kaplan. Cinematography by Stan Meredith. Narrated by Shepperd Strudwick.
